page.title: 17CAMPING WITH CUBS
page.content: One of my interests is belonging to Cubs.I belong to the Leigh Sinton pack because this is the nearest one.On the weekend of the 22nd.and 23rd.June I went to camp at Eastnor Park,just outside Ledbury. The leaders and our parents pitched the tents. When they were up we went inside to put our clothes and sleeping bags away.There were five of us in our tent.After tea I helped with the washing up and then went to bed, because it was 9:30pm. On Saturday morning I helped to cook breakfast.We had sausages,bacon and fried bread.After breakfast we tidied our tents for inspection.After inspection we did a survival course on the camp-site.We made a shelter from dead branches and ferns,a mask and a small fire.
